document.full_text: as demonstrators for and against president ali abdullah saleh poured into the streets, the yemeni leader said he was ready to yield power but only if he could hand it over to 'safe hands.'
document.title: yemeni leader would yield power only to 'safe hands'
lines_and_colors: as demonstrators for and against president ali abdullah saleh poured into the streets, the yemeni leader said he was ready to yield power but only if he could hand it over to 'safe hands.'
